import React from 'react'; const HeatingSection = ({ formData, onHeatingMethodChange, onKnowsMonthlyGasUsageChange, onKnowsAnnualGasUsageChange, onMonthlyGasChange, onAnnualGasUsageChange, onHeatPumpCOPChange }) => { const months = [ { key: "january", label: "January" }, { key: "february", label: "February" }, { key: "march", label: "March" }, { key: "april", label: "April" }, { key: "may", label: "May" }, { key: "june", label: "June" }, { key: "july", label: "July" }, { key: "august", label: "August" }, { key: "september", label: "September" }, { key: "october", label: "October" }, { key: "november", label: "November" }, { key: "december", label: "December" } ]; return ( <>
{formData.heatingMethod === "gas boiler" && ( <>
{formData.knowsMonthlyGasUsage === "yes" && (

Monthly gas usage (kWh)

Please enter your gas usage for each month:

{months.map(month => (
onMonthlyGasChange(month.key, e.target.value)} placeholder="kWh" min="0" step="0.1" className="form-input month-input" required />
))}
)} {formData.knowsMonthlyGasUsage === "no" && ( <>
{formData.knowsAnnualGasUsage === "yes" && (
)} )} )} {formData.heatingMethod === "heat pumps" && (
If you don't know, the default value of 3.0 will be used.
)} ); }; export default HeatingSection;
